apiKey.description: Honcho API key (or set HONCHO_API_KEY env var)

alignmentQueries.description: Dialectic questions for Layer 2 deep alignment (or set HONCHO_ALIGNMENT_QUERIES pipe-delimited)

representationQuery.description: Semantic search query for Layer 3 recent context (or set HONCHO_REPRESENTATION_QUERY)

values.description: Values statement injected into identity prompt (or set HONCHO_VALUES)

principles.description: Operating principles injected into identity prompt (or set HONCHO_PRINCIPLES pipe-delimited)

roleName.description: Role name for the system prompt header (or set HONCHO_ROLE_NAME)

enableSafetyFilter.description: Strip internal/operational context from Layer 3 before injection

enableOutboundScanning.description: Scan outbound messages for PII and secrets before sending

identityTimeoutMs.description: Timeout in ms for identity loading (or set HONCHO_IDENTITY_TIMEOUT)

dreamAfterConversations.description: Trigger a Honcho dream cycle after N conversations (or set HONCHO_DREAM_AFTER)
